Opportunity Attack

Attack an enemy moving out of your reach.

Opportunity Attack is a Reaction in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Opportunity Attack Information
